name: WinZip Configuration File
summary: Learn about .WZCONFIG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To apply the settings in a WZCONFIG file to WinZip, double-click the file to open it. After the settings have been imported, WinZip displays a message that states, "The WinZip configuration file was processed successfully."

description: Settings file used by WinZip, a file compression and decompression program; saved using XML formatting and contains configuration parameters for the program, such as email account information for the "Zip and E-mail" option; used for saving and loading application settings.
